query: I need assistance in planning a 7-day journey beginning from Louisville, aiming to experience 3 different cities within Florida. The proposed dates are between March 23rd and March 29th, 2022, and I have a new budget of $7,800.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Miami,Fort Lauderdale,Orlando]
